title: EUW is down?!?
body: Read topic... Cant connect the running game. Every player dced.

replies.body: Bin auch gerade in einem ranked und komme nicht wieder ins game rein, nachdem ich DCed wurde...
EUW wieder da und Games wurden nicht gewertet 40min für das Popöchen {{summoner:14}} {{item:3175}}
jup bei mir genau so.  40 min. für die katz....
Same here... auch am Ranked spielen gewesen am gewinnen und das spiel ist spurlos verschwunden... Da muss mal Sharlock ran...
Dabei warn wir grad so schön am gewinnen -.-  >-> FUCK{{item:3416}}

Same
Zudem noch in Meiner Promotion ... -.-
Same Problem was in Ranked cant connect
Now I got the alert, that there is a maintenance going on. Thank Riot for sharing that information now.

Sometimes I really hate this game.

Got the play button selected ARAM got the screen "Game still in progress..." could not see anything when the que popped and closed the client. Now I have to wait 12min for abadoning a que. Really Riot? One time I dodge Q after 100games and 12min punish. Was not even my fault I could not see anything but "Game still in progress..."
